<!--[XENTR:js_global:xtr_gradient_start]-->
<xf:if is="{{ property('xtr_logo_position') }} == 'insidenav' && {{ property('xtr_message_block_enable') }} == '1' && {{ property('xtr_gradient_bg_animations') }} == '1'">	
<xf:js>
function checkGradeient() {
    //gradient animations
    var colors = new Array(
        [62, 35, 255], [60, 255, 60], [255, 35, 98], [45, 175, 230], [255, 0, 255], [255, 128, 0]);

    var step = 0;
    //color table indices for:
    // current color left
    // next color left
    // current color right

    // next color right
    var colorIndices = [0, 1, 2, 3];

    //transition speed
    var gradientSpeed = 0.002;

    function updateGradient() {

        if ($ === undefined) return;

        var c0_0 = colors[colorIndices[0]];
        var c0_1 = colors[colorIndices[1]];
        var c1_0 = colors[colorIndices[2]];
        var c1_1 = colors[colorIndices[3]];

        var istep = 1 - step;
        var r1 = Math.round(istep * c0_0[0] + step * c0_1[0]);
        var g1 = Math.round(istep * c0_0[1] + step * c0_1[1]);
        var b1 = Math.round(istep * c0_0[2] + step * c0_1[2]);
        var color1 = "rgb(" + r1 + "," + g1 + "," + b1 + ")";

        var r2 = Math.round(istep * c1_0[0] + step * c1_1[0]);
        var g2 = Math.round(istep * c1_0[1] + step * c1_1[1]);
        var b2 = Math.round(istep * c1_0[2] + step * c1_1[2]);
        var color2 = "rgb(" + r2 + "," + g2 + "," + b2 + ")";

        $('.xtr-overlay').css({
            background: "-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(" + color1 + "), to(" + color2 + "))"
        }).css({
            background: "-moz-linear-gradient(left, " + color1 + " 0%, " + color2 + " 100%)"
        });

        step += gradientSpeed;
        if (step >= 1) {
            step %= 1;
            colorIndices[0] = colorIndices[1];
            colorIndices[2] = colorIndices[3];

            //pick two new target color indices
            //do not pick the same as the current one
            colorIndices[1] = (colorIndices[1] + Math.floor(1 + Math.random() * (colors.length - 1))) % colors.length;
            colorIndices[3] = (colorIndices[3] + Math.floor(1 + Math.random() * (colors.length - 1))) % colors.length;

        }
    }

    setInterval(updateGradient, 10);
}

if ($(".xtr-overlay").length) {
    checkGradeient()
}	
</xf:js>
</xf:if>

<xf:if is="{{ property('xtr_right_click') }}">
	<xf:js>
		$(document).bind('contextmenu',function(e){ return false; });
	</xf:js>
</xf:if>

group.title: XenTR Global Settings
group.description: General options for the theme are listed here.

group.title: XenTR User/Mod Bar
group.description: Controls the moderator bar and/or the user bar settings and styling.

group.title: XenTR Header and Navigation
group.description: Generic header and navigation specific settings.

group.title: XenTR Message Block
group.description: Create welcome messages for guests and members of your community.

group.title: XenTR Quick Touch
group.description: Controls the block settings you can use for quick solution suggestions on your website.

group.title: XenTR Breadcrumb
group.description: Settings related to the breadcrumb and its components.

group.title: XenTR Node/Forum list
group.description: Controls the display and properties of the categories and other node types.

group.title: XenTR Discussion List
group.description: Control on the appearance of the list of discussions within a forum.

group.title: XenTR Messages
group.description: Thread list styling, post styles, and post settings.

group.title: XenTR XENTR Social
group.description: Social share buttons settings are available in this section.

property.title: Avatar border radius
property.description: Controls the size of the rounded corners on avatars - a sufficiently large value will make avatars circular

property.title: Block filter bar
property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

property.title: Block header
property.description: Blocks often have title bars at their tops, which are styled here

property.title: Block minor header
property.description: Sub-headings in blocks use these settings

property.title: Block padding vertical
property.description: The vertical space between a block's content and its edges

property.title: Border color
property.description: Structural borders around blocks of content generally use this color

property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Highlighted content area base
property.description: If an area of content is selected, for example a row in a table, its normal background will be substituted with this

property.title: Body Text Font
property.description: This font is used for the text of messages etc.
property.value: "'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif"

property.title: User Interface Font
property.description: The font list for your main text
property.value: "'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif"

property.title: Link color
property.description: Basic hyperlinks on standard background colors will use this style

property.title: Link hover color
property.description: Basic hyperlinks will turn this color when hovered

property.title: Message user info block width
property.description: Controls the width of the (left) user info column on the full size message block

property.title: Message user info elements
property.description: The elements selected here will be displayed in the message user info block. It will not be displayed below the single column width.

property.title: Description display style
property.description: To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip

property.title: Sub-forums display style
property.description: Choose the style in which sub-forums will be displayed within a particular node element, according to the amount of space you want them to occupy

property.title: Maximum page width
property.description: As the window is resized, it will continue to grow in width until this value, after which it will remain static

property.title: Logo URL
property.description: The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image.

property.title: Navigation row
property.description: The navigation row sits below the header and contains the primary site navigation tabs and menus

property.title: Navigation padding horizontal
property.description: Defines the amount of padding applied horizontally to each main navigational tab in the header

property.title: Navigation padding vertical
property.description: This value defines the amount of padding applied to the main navigational tabs in the header

property.title: Navigation row - tab
property.description: Controls the styling of individual tab elements within the navigation row

property.title: Push notification badge URL
property.description: If you provide the URL to a single color/alpha channel logo/icon here, this will be used in place of the browser's default icon.

property.title: Show Home Tab as Icon
property.description: Selecting this will replace the text 'Home' with a house icon.

property.title: Sidebar and side navigation spacer
property.description: Distance between the main content and the sidebar

property.title: Sidebar and side navigation width
property.description: Width of any elements that make up the sidebar

property.title: Enable collapsible nodes
property.description: Shows to nodes with collapsible.

property.title: Node layout
property.description: Here, select the style in which the forums are displayed.
property.value_parameters: default=Default classic=Classic classicImage= Classic Image dual=Dual Column

property.title: Node layout classic node
property.description: These styles only apply to classic nodes layouts.

property.title: Enable account page sidenav icons?
property.description: The sidebar on the account page adds font-awesome icons in front of the links.

property.title: Enable background shapes
property.description: This feature allows moving shapes to be displayed over the background.

property.title: Switcher background height
property.description: Here you can specify the height values for the live preview background changer. Min height: 100px Max height: 300px

property.title: Enable category blok header image
property.description: This option enables or disables the category title image system. Only active if Classic Image and Dual Column is selected from the style properties.

property.title: Enable breadcrumb bottom social share?
property.description: This feature will make social sharing passive under breadcrumb.

property.title: Breadcrumb height
property.description: It allows you to control the breadcrumb height. Min height: 30px Max height: 100px

property.title: Enable button hover effect
property.description: Adds a glowing effect from left to right for all buttons.

property.title: Enable category description hover
property.description: Sets the category description style with hover.

property.title: Sidebar collapsible off
property.description: Unicode of the Icon.

property.title: Sidebar collapsible on
property.description: Unicode of the Icon.

property.title: Enable contact us button
property.description: Displays a link that brings up the contact form.

property.title: Enable conversation button
property.description: If this options is enabled conversation buttons will be added the user-info.

property.title: Enable conversation read checkmark
property.description: Add a check mark next to a user's name in a conversation after they've read the last post in a conversation.

property.title: Disable sub-navigation
property.description: Here you can hide sublinks linked to the main navigation.

property.title: Enable quick touch blocks
property.description: Quick touch blocks are displayed on above the breadcrumb.You can use quick touch blocks for easy access to the right areas that you are targeting.

property.title: Enable extra footer first column
property.description: First, make sure that you've enabled extra footer option. Than you may use first column selection or first content.

property.title: Extra footer block links
Extra footer block width
property.description: Extra footer block preferred width Default width: 280px

property.title: Optional extra footer column selection
property.description: If this options will be choosen "Custom Footer" you need to fil up below option (Footer Column 1 Content)
property.value_parameters: ForumStatistics=Forum statistics OnlineStatistics=Online statistics whatsNewLinks=Whats New Links sharePage= Share This Page socialicons=Social Links custom=Custom Footer

property.title: Optional extra footer column selection
property.description: If this options will be choosen "Custom Footer" you need to fil up below option (Footer Column 2 Content)
property.value_parameters: ForumStatistics=Forum statistics OnlineStatistics=Online statistics whatsNewLinks=Whats New Links sharePage= Share This Page socialicons=Social Links custom=Custom Footer

property.title: Optional extra footer column selection
property.description: If this options will be choosen "Custom Footer" you need to fil up below option (Footer Column 3 Content)
property.value_parameters: ForumStatistics=Forum statistics OnlineStatistics=Online statistics whatsNewLinks=Whats New Links sharePage= Share This Page socialicons=Social Links custom=Custom Footer

property.title: Optional extra footer column selection
property.description: If this options will be choosen "Custom Footer" you need to fil up below option (Footer Column 4 Content)
property.value_parameters: ForumStatistics=Forum statistics OnlineStatistics=Online statistics whatsNewLinks=Whats New Links sharePage= Share This Page socialicons=Social Links custom=Custom Footer

property.title: Extra footer column 1 content
property.description: Enter the extra footer first column content.
property.value:
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat."

property.title: Extra footer column 2 content
property.description: Enter the extra footer second column content.
property.value:
"
Custom Link 1
Custom Link 2
Custom Link 3
Custom Link 4
"

property.title: Extra footer column 3 content
property.description: Enter the extra footer third column content.

property.title: Extra footer column 4 content
property.description: Enter the extra footer fourth column content.

property.title: Extra footer column 1 icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the first column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Extra footer column 2 icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the second column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Extra footer column 3 icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the third column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Extra footer column 4 icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the fourth column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Extra footer column 1 title
property.description: Enter the extra footer first column title

property.title: Extra footer column 2 title
property.description: Enter the extra footer second column title

property.title: Extra footer column 3 title
property.description: Enter the extra footer third column title

property.title: Extra footer column 4 title
property.description: Enter the extra footer fourth column title

property.title: Files Path
property.description: Define the path to your style folder

property.title: Enable footer wave
property.description: This option creates a wave effect on the footer.

property.title: Wave fill background
property.description: This option is generally the footer background color.

property.title: Footer wave height
property.description: You can adjust the height of the wave effect. Min height: 30px Max height: 100px

property.title: Footer wave transform
property.description: Here you can determine the wave structure.

property.title: Footer wave width
property.description: Here you can adjust the width of the wave effect. Min 100px Max 300px

property.title: Hide page title on forum list
property.description: This option disables the H1 title on the forum list only. This feature does not work if Inside navigation is selected.

property.title: Google fonts
property.description: Choose the fonts in which to load from Google Fonts API.

property.title: Enable gradient background animations
property.description: This option automatically provides gradient color options on background images within the message block area.

property.title: Guest Message block content
property.description: Here you can enter a content for guest users.
property.value: "Join us now to get access to all our features. Once registered and logged in, you will be able to create topics, post replies to existing threads, give reputation to your fellow members, get your own private messenger, and so, so much more. It's also quick and totally free, so what are you waiting for?"

property.title: Guest Message block title
property.description: Here you can specify a welcome title for guest users.

property.title: Hide user avatar next quick reply editor
property.description: Hide or display user avatar on message editor.

property.title: Enable links hover effect
property.description: This feature will apply an effect when hovering over certain links.

property.title: Enable live background picker?
property.description: If enabled, your members will be able to select their own background/header image using the live background picker.

property.title: Choose default image
property.description: Here you can show a standard background to your users who visit your website when the live background switcher is activated.

property.title: Select logo position
property.description: Here you can select the logo position.
property.value_parameters: default=Default position belownav=Below navigation insidenav=Inside navigation

property.title: Enable bubble animation
property.description: Enables us to show animated bubbles within the message block.

property.title: Enable message block
property.description:
Here you can show a welcome message for users who visit your website.
This feature only works if the Inside navigation option in the XenTR Header and Navigation group is enabled.

property.title: Mesage block height
property.description: You can adjust the height of the message block area here. Min height: 60px Max height: 300px. Default height: 70px

property.title: Enable message control icons
property.description: Add Font Awesome icons to the message controls.

property.title: Message links
property.description: Controls the styling for links inside of messages

property.title: Enable message wave
property.description: This option creates a wave effect within the message area.

property.title: Message wave height
property.description: You can adjust the height of the wave effect. Min height: 30px Max height: 100px

property.title: Message wave transform
property.description: Here you can determine the wave structure.

property.title: Message wave width
property.description: Here you can adjust the width of the wave effect. Min 100px Max 300px

property.title: Enable quick touch on mobile devices?
property.description: When this option is enabled, the quick touch will be closed according to the following width dimensions.

property.title: Enable navigation links hover effect
property.description: Adds an effect when hovering over the navigation links.

property.title: Enable new post button
property.description: This feature allows you to add a new message button in the subject area.

property.title: Enable Font Awesome Node Icons?
property.description: This will enable the ability to add font awesome icons for node icons

property.title: Node layout classic stats
property.description: These properties only apply to classic stats in node layouts.

property.title: Node row background color
property.description: Controls the color of the node row backgrounds.

property.title: Enable node stats hover
property.description: When the mouse is hovering over the forum icons, the number of forum topics will be displayed instead of the icon.

property.title: Hover Effect on Nodes
property.description: This option enables a hover effect for classic nodes.

property.title: Normal Threads Phrase
property.description: Please enter a phrase to separate.

property.title: Enable notable member page icons?
property.description: This option adds font-awesome icons to the important member page

property.title: Overlay and gradient opacity
property.description: You can add a semi-transparent overlay here which may result in better contrast with your text. Enter a value between 0 and 1.

property.title: Enable prefix filter
property.description: If you want to use prefix filter make sure "Use full friendly URLs" options is enabled on Board Settings.

property.title: Primary Color
property.description: It will be the color used for special accent areas.

property.title: Quick Touch first column button name
Quick Touch first column URL
property.description: Here you can enter a URL for the first column button.

property.title: Quick Touch Mobile Width
property.description: When this option is enabled, the quick touch will be closed according to the following width dimensions.

property.title: Make a link open a new window
property.description: When your visitors click that link, it will open in a new window or tab (depending on which web browser they are using and how they configured that browser).

property.title: Quick Touch first column content
property.description: Here you can enter a content for the first column area.
property.value: "Ask Questions and Get Answers from Our Community"

property.title: Quick Touch first column icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the first column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Quick Touch First Column Heading
property.description: Here you can enter a title for the first column area.

property.title: Quick Touch second column button name
property.description: Here you can enter Quick Touch second column button name.

property.title: Make a link open a new window
property.description: When your visitors click that link, it will open in a new window or tab (depending on which web browser they are using and how they configured that browser).

property.title: Quick Touch second column content
property.description: Here you can enter a content for the second column area.
property.value: "Answer Questions and Become an Expert on Your Topic"

property.title: Quick Touch second column icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the second column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Quick Touch Second Column Heading
property.description: Here you can enter a title for the second column area.

property.title: Quick Touch second column URL
property.description: Here you can enter a URL for the second column button.

property.title: Quick touch Show on all pages.
property.description: If this option is enabled Quick Touch blocks display on all pages. You can disable this option if you want to display the quick touch blocks only on the main page.

property.title: Quick Touch third column button name
property.description: Here you can enter Quick Touch third column button name.

property.title: Make a link open a new window
property.description: When your visitors click that link, it will open in a new window or tab (depending on which web browser they are using and how they configured that browser).

property.title: Quick Touch third column content
property.description: Here you can enter a content for the third column area.
property.value: "Our Experts are Ready to Answer your Questions"

property.title: Quick Touch third column icon
property.description:
Here you can enter a icon definition for the third column field.
You'll find here . Enter the fontawesome icon definition like this example: fas fa-home

property.title: Quick Touch Third Column Heading
property.description: Here you can enter a title for the third column area.

property.title: Quick Touch third column URL
property.description: Here you can enter a URL for the third column button.

property.title: Resource sidebar width
property.description: Using this feature, you can adjust the width of the sidebar on the resource page.

property.title: Resource sticky sidebar height
property.description: Using this feature, you can adjust the height of the sticky sidebar on the resource page.

property.title: Enable RSS Feed button
property.description: Displays a link to the main RSS feed

property.title: Disable sidebar
property.description: Close the sidebar.

property.title: Sidebar Position
property.description: Allows you to change the location of the sidebar.

property.title: Enable sidebar icons?
property.description: This option is add the font-awesome icons to the sidebar.

property.title: Show social icons in breadcrumb
property.description: Make sure social URL's have been entered.

property.title: Sticky sidebar height
property.description: This feature enables the height of the adhesive sidebar to be activated.

property.title: Enable Separate sticky threads?
property.description: Normal and sticky threads are used to separate.

property.title: Sticky threads height
property.description: Please enter a value to stick threads bar height.

property.title: Sticky Threads Phrase
property.description: Please enter a phrase to separate.

property.title: Select the style changer icon
property.description: Select the font-awwsome icon you want to display here
property.value_parameters: fa-sun=Sun fa-adjust=Adjust fa-brush=Brush fa-fill=Fill fa-lightbulb=Lightbulb fa-moon=Moon fa-palette=Palette

property.title: Style changer phrase
property.description: You can enter a text here. For example, Light mode

property.title: Select style changer position
property.description: Here you can specify the location for the style changer. Footer is selected by defaul

property.title: Style ID
property.description: Enter the style ID that you want to change here. You can enter "0" to override.

property.title: Enable message user info block sticky
property.description: This feature fixes the user block in the message field.

property.title: Enable visitor menu icon?
property.description: After the user login, it adds font-awesome icons to the links in the menu area.

property.title: Visitor tabs location
property.description: The Header option applies only to the default and below navigation options.

property.title: Message block wave fill background
property.description: This option is generally the body background color.
